channel.title: [pi] IP CHECKING
channel.description:
So hey, when someone logs in, I want it to show in my run cmd, their ip.
RuneSource has this, but Sadly,the one I downloaded came infected, so i no longer trust anything :(
How do i make it so when someone logs in on the run cmd it shows their ip.
Purpose: I don't want to do ::ban y d t , would take long to know how many spaces in name. Revision: PI 474 loading 317

item.title: [pi] IP CHECKING

item.description:

kk thanks i will retry.

item.title: [pi] IP CHECKING

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Angel Carlos, post:3, topic:522830”]I know, but do you know anything?

I tried doing it like the ipban, where it write the ip on a file, but i got errors.[/quote]
Look how the ip ban works, instead of banning the ip, have it load on spawn.
